Address: / / Bangkok / Central / Thailand
Visit Description:
Martijn and I visited IA 49. They are the sister company for A 49 and focuses on the interior, while A49 designs the architecture. They are a very big design firm that specialize in hotels and condominiums. They have many ongoing condominium and hotel projects but Khun Sipparum and Sukanya would not specify which ones. After digging through their website, these are their upcoming projects:

Condominium projects: One Bangkok, Ashton Asoke, and Siamese Gateway

Hospital projects: Chulalongkorn Memorial Hospital

Hotel projects: The JW Marriot Resort in Phuket, and Palm 360 in Dubai

Other projects: PTT headquarter office, and a Broadcasting studio for NBT

They were already familiar with Forms & Surfaces. We explained to them that we are currently the exclusive distributor and that F&S now has a production facility in India, allowing us to give better prices and lead times.

We left all our brochures with Khun Sipparum and she will contact us if they have any inquiries.
Next Visit:
Perm will keep an eye on overseas projects

Su will keep an eye on condominium projects in BKK

Pookie will keep an eye on Marriott Resort in Phuket

I do a long presentation for Suniture Item and F&S material. K Prim is interested in our cushions replacement for Oyama and Hoyo. She ask if we can provided some of our outdoor stock fabrics so she can make a proposal to the owner.

ABC is buying the laminated glass from BSG Glass. BSG is doing the architectural glass wall BSG is offering price around 1,000 to 1,500 THB per SQM, which is customize design and 2weeks -3 weeks lead. I also presend form&surface glass and K Prim is asking price per sqm for the gradient glass and would request some of laminated glass sample to her office.

I leave our cushion set, EQD sample, placemat set and some of F&S Stainless Steel material. K Prim will send us when having the need of the glass.

Visit Date:
2/6/2015

Adrian Tan

Visit By Jum BVZTH
Visit Description:
Adrian from Cartoonnetwork water park in Pattaya came over to the factory.
He would like to order 120 pcs for sunbeds in Gazebo (bought from Tucci) to add value for customers who rent it out during a visit.

He showed me material hard PE foam used and VC fabric which local maker proposed to make cushion, it feels very hard and cheap.

He said he has budget under 2000Baht for each cushion size 75 x 200 x 5 H cms.

Another issue are:

They are looking for massage pavilion which could fit 10-12 beds with budget under 300,000. He asked if we could go to site visit and recommend anything that suit.

There is an area which they would like a sponsor for furniture and so on and asked if we would be interested in doing so.

There are 2 more hotel projects in behind and in front of the waterpark.
Next Visit:
-Send quote of 120 pcs.
-Beer to visit at site for massage pavilion.
-Henk to visit the CEO of this project.

- Informed them that I will be handling his account from now on.

- They seem to be money concious of the budget and indicated that they need low cost material and they would import themself for Thread even we gave them low price.

- Provided clear plastic for them to consider becayse Atrterglass is high price.

- Provide price of both UL, Phifertex, Thread and Zipper but they will check if some boat are needed to be upgrade to be more luxurious and they will consider again.

Address: 101/3 Bophut Bay, Samui Island / / Suratthani / Southern / Thailand(84320)
Visit Date:
3/30/2012

Khun Chutima

Visit By Kittisak Kaewpipat
Visit Description:
Visited Khun Chutima (Assist. Executive Houskeeper) to ask her about renovation project of Delux Room.

She just join the resort and this coming Sunday new Executive Housekeeper will also join the property.

She only could tell that the mock up room will be done be the end of April but all detail we have to contact Minor Group in BKK. However, I have given her Suniture brochure and informed what we can do and assist her for future project.

Called K. Kui (Merchandiser in BKK), shed told me to call K. Kul (Ratha-Assist. Project Development Manager).

K. Kul said the mock up room has been done by local supplier and her boss will inspect by the end of April. Once things have been approved, she will announce to all supplier to bid for whole project (around May 2012).
Next Visit: Contact K. Kul again for whole project after mock up has been approved.

Address: 62/16 Petchkasem Road, T. Nongkae, / A. Hua Hin / Prachuabkhirikhan / Western / Thailand(77110)
Visit Date:
7/3/2006

Mr Msc Leo J. Bax

Visit By Kittisak Kaewpipat
Visit Description:
The 2 main objectives to see them are

Set up the factory
Look for the distributor in HHQ area


Mr Bax explained us about his business that 99 % is all export and they divide their task into 2 lines as below

Arrow Wood makes engineer flooring (wooden floor)
Arrow Action is making furniture (mainly indoor furniture)
Their outdoor furniture made of chemical stuff such as Nylon, Polyester which are imported from overseas

Their indoor furniture made of real material such as rattan.

They prefer making the indoor furniture to outdoor furniture because the bigger margin. Regarding to cushion and sewing operation, they do themselves but low quantity.



Henk said he would like to have the factory in the area for 300-400 square meters and also showroom for 200 square meters.

Mr Bax is going to open new showroom and new factory in this coming August in the same place (3,000 square meters) which is about 6 km. away from the current one. Therefore, he can rent us a place for showroom or factory but he said he wanted us to find labors and sewing operation by ourselves and also find Sales staff.



In the beginning of this agreement, what we can do is to put our stuffs like Parasol sets, base & tube on the consignment basis and also provide them marketing materials. The current showroomæŠ¯ ceiling is too low so we canæŠ° put our new frame. We will wait until they open new showroom.

Name: Roger Diggelmann

Address: 131 Moo 2, T.Wangrongyai.A Sikew / Nakornrachasima / Nakornrachsima / North East / Thailand
Visit Description:
Went to visit Asia Membrane in Korat with Kurt.

We have not been in touch with them due to the change of sales staff.

In our visit, we discussed about Atex, Monotec and Verseidag with Mr Surat and Khun Lux.

Generally, they are reliant on one customer - Park and Garden. They try to sell the premium fabrics but in the end, they mentioned that the Thai market prefers cheaper fabric such as PVC. They have resulted in selling cheaper fabrics but give less warranty.
They are also slowly branching into installation.

Atex
They have never fabricated silicone coated fiber glass. The suvarnabhumi airport is PTFE.
They are able to give it a go but they prefer to just fabricate and not install.

Monotec
They work closely with Park and Garden, who Martin Brown is also a close friend of.
Martin Brown provides the software to Park and Garden.
P & G buy directly from Monotec which is why they get a much better price than us.
Kurt spoke to Nick and he said that the reason why we are not exclusive and do not get a better price is due to the fact that we are unwilling to take stock. However we asked for better support on their side.

Verseidag
They are a big fan of Verseidag but Mr.Surat is very loyal to Ferrari.
We quoted them our best price for Verseidag as they also buy from TDD.
Next Visit: -Stay in touch with Khun Lux, she is the one coordinating etc.

Address: 24/6 Soi Kasemsan 1 Rama 1 Road Wangmai Pathumwan Bangkok / 10330 Thailand / / / Thailand
Visit Description:
Went to visit Khun Liang at Atelier of Architects Fastform.

Fastform is a construction company that partners with Atelier.
The MD and two sales staff from Fastform were present.

Khun Liang invited us to present Atex to Fastform which after some discussion, was taken back about the pricing of Atex. They have a project they are going to tender for which will need around 2000sqm of fabric.

We then moved onto Verseidag which they are very interested in partnering with us. They currently buy from Ferrari for THB 400 p/sqm but we can quote to them at THB370 p/sqm.

They asked for fabrication but I informed them that we are just a fabrics distributor but we can refer and know of fabricators.

I also showed them Monotec which the salesgirl was interested in and says she saw at Harrow Intl school etc that uses this and took the sample.

Overall it was a very positive meeting, Khun Liang wished for a closer partnership and that hopefully we can do business together.
Fastform MD was more aggressive and seemed taken back about the pricing but he respects Khun Liang's input.

Fastform requirements:
Special pricing for close cooperation and partnership
PVDF - 750g
Monotec prices
Amount needed to tension the fabric
Project references

Atelier requirements:
Meeting Rainald in March
Next Visit:
-Price list of Verseidag
-Price list of Monotec
-Project references in Thailand of Verseidag

Address: 222 Ratchaprarop rd., / Ratchathewi / Bangkok / Central / Thailand(10400)
Visit Date:
11/20/2012

Piyalert Baiyoke

Visit By Jum BVZTH
Visit Description:
Met, K. Piyalert a vice chairman of this hotel group with his assistant and a purchasing manager of this new 5 star hotel project called Huachang Heritage Hotel near Siam Discovery and MBK.

The designer has specified Suniture outdoor cushion in a small pool area which is not ready for measuring while sunbeds aluminium + textilne will be either Kenkoon for nice and high end or Shunthai for cheap option.

Normally this hotel group owns many 3 star hotels with potential in selling, therefore, cheap and low quality items used. He asked if I could do indoor cushions for 80 rooms because he wants to compare price with another bidder I inspected the room, all items look cheap and awful to my surprise as this is supposed to be a 5 star hotel. I assume they change specifications and replace them with cheap items.

However, he is impressed with Buru presentation and he likes Bora wicker set.

He requested me to coordinate with the designer to change fabric of the cushion as the colour and pattern do not go with the hotel colour (white + grey)
Next Visit:
To email the Buru presentation.

To change fabric and measure at site.

Its been a while since our last contact with beautiful world. They usually work with VC fabrics and imports rettan furniture from elsewhere.
Interested in our vertical blinds and umbrellas, asked for a catalog.

เข้าพบคุณจีรารัตน์ (พี่จิน) เป็นผู้จัดการแผนกจัดซื้อ และสโตร์ เจ้าของโรงแรมชื่อ
คุณกำพล สุภรณ์สหัสรังษี โดยมีโรงแรมในเครือ อาทิ เช่น Palm Garden , Sea Lodge ,Rose Bay หลัง Big c พัทยาเหนือ , The Cottage , บ้านน้ำเมา. จำนวนห้องพัก 183 ห้อง พี่จินแจ้งว่าโรงแรมในเครือทั้งหมด กำลังเริ่มทยอยปรับปรุงเช่นกัน และจัดซื้อของในเครือ จะขึ้นตรงที่ botany จะนำเสนอคุณน้ำหวาน ภรรยาผู้บริหารให้ เนื่องจากคุณน้ำหวานเป็นคนสมัยใหม่ โดยร่มที่โรงแรม จะเป็นร่มกลม สีขาว เบาะอาบแดดสีน้ำเงิน
เป็น PVC พี่จินแจ้งถึงปัญหาของ PVC จึงนำเสนอในส่วนของ Ultra Fabric ซึ่งมรความสนใจ และได้ฝากเล่มสินค้าไว้นำให้ เจ้าของได้พิจารณา

Visit Description:
- We visited K.Muzza and gave a New Year gift to him. K.Muzza said he was quite busy and business getting better. He is under working on 20 boats and mentioned he needs more Regalite Clear 1 MM about 10-15 sheets as the old stock is almost gone. He asked us to check lead time delivery and if possible he wants us to keep stock for these products as he would regularly use them. I told him would ask K. Kurt to check and get back to him later.
- Another point, he mentioned Sauleda fabric that he bought from us to make Roof's boat. He said when finished sewing. He saw a lot of scratches on the fabric and his customers were very concerned about the look as Sunbrella does not have this kind of problem.
I explained the scratches could happen as the fabric had a special coating on top and the scratches would be gone after using it for a while. K.Muzza understood but his customer would not. They expect the fabric to look nicer. I told him would inform the issue to Sauleda and ask them to investigate or if there is any solution we could give a better explanation to consumers.
- I showed the new sample for the boat floor to K.Muzza and asked his idea which one is the most workable for the boat. He said he does not use this material but he said the best one should include glue at the back.
Next Visit:
- Follow up delivery leadtime of Regalite clear.
- Sauleda scratches issue

Name: Thirakiati Chirathivat

Address: 25th Floor , Centara Grand at Central World / 999/99 Rama 1 Road, Pathumwan / Bangkok / Central / Thailand(10330)
Visit Date:
11/13/2012

Robert F. Maurer Loeffler

Visit By Jum BVZTH
Visit Description:
Met, Robert, GM, Sa-ngiam , PM, Prayuth, asst to FB mananger regarding the fabric for seat cushions (Po recieved) at Redsky restaurant on 55flr. QTY 147 pcs.The GM chose Jockey Red. But he also wants new pillow covers which will be in Jockey red, Tuscan, butter cup. And he asks for the mock-up. I will offer the mock up with filling so that they can see the quality.


-There are many items to be replaced and I expect more PO next year (1st Quater) This is the first time they use Sunbrella (previously PVC + cheap foam) They are fed up iwth

-I recommend them use mesh under but the GM is concerned about the durability of the mesh. They expect them to last for 3 years at least as the PVC cushions lasted them for 2 years.

If they are impressed with the result, I am sure we will have many chance with more property of Centara since Mr. Therakiet is stationed here and takes care of purchase for every hotel(22 hotels)

-They also plan to open another 2 Centara in Maldives with 3 restaurants.
He looks for cheap deal and will see a Spanish company who supplies outdoor items.

-Also I presented the GM , outdoor sofa and BURU which he has recieved the 3D and a consignment offer but he did not show any reaction and seemed unsure. However, the PM is interested in outdoor sofa.

Address: 300 Soi Sukhumvit 63,(Eakamai),Sukhumvit Rd. / Klongton Nua,Vadhana,Bangkok 10110 / Bangkok / Central / Thailand(10110)
Visit Description:
- I met K.Kai's purchasing dept as she requested for Agora catalog. I take this chance to discuss their situation with Sunbrella. K.Kai said Charoen sell many different fabric and Sunbrella is just one in their collection and her boss is not really happy with the way Sunbrella proposes them. Sunbrella forces them to keep stock but the fabric is non of the popular fabric. It takes a year to sell out. and now August&Son by Chang and Pui running Sunbrella themself to the market. Also, Amadeep has promoted K.Kai to run the Thai market under Amadeep Thailand. Glen Raven is ruining the market with many representatives. Charoen, they do not see any benefit at all.

- K.Kai said some projects specify Agora and are under bidding. If she Win the project she will let me know to update.

Visit By Jum BVZTH
Visit Description:
Introduced by Aey's friend, with Beer, met the president K.Prinda of Cherry Serina, the Thai-Japanese joint-venture company between the Seri Wathana Industry Co., Ltd. and Ishikawa Gasket Co., Ltd., is the manufacturer of engine gaskets, packing and heat insulators for automobiles, motorcycle and general purpose engines.

She wants to have sail shade in front of the factory to protect against rain. The dimension approximately is 400W X 1500L X 4500H with fabric that could give 20 year warranty. In this case Versaidag will not apply as it is only 10 years warranty.

She asked about projects we have done so far and wants to make sure that we are really professional and give after sales service, such as if screw become lose and cleaning we should provide these services too during this period.

Remark:

1.She would like 2-3 styles to be proposed in 3D and quotation.
2.Would like it semi permanent, if possible.
3.There are always container trucks (4M high) so the shade must be higher than the truck.
4.The sails must not overshadow 2 tall trees in the garden.
5. Must protect against rain.
6.Last 20 years.

Visit Date:
8/9/2020

Luc Dayot

Visit By Kurt De Wilde
Visit Description:
Plaii, Katip and Kurt met with Luc Dayot.
He just opened a very large shop, focusing on the Skyline brand of outdoor furniture, made in Indonesia. He still has a large sign of Sunbrella outside. Skyline only works with Sunbrellla, but he said that some customers are complaining that the color choice of the fabrics is too limited.

He is the franchise holde rof Skyline for Thailand, Cambodia, Myanmar and Vietnam. He was the former head of Carrefour in Thailand.

Kurt has informed Agora (Pepe) that Lili should visit Skyline in Surabaya to convince them using Agora fabrics.

Chic furniture focuses on the residential market with some projects now and then. His business seems to be doing well, especially with the more affluent Thai in Phuket.

He complained a bit that the Lilos from Suniture (consignment) are not in a color that appleals to the Phuket customer (Agora Simmetria in pink/orange color).

He also sells Maiori sofas (with Sunbrella covers) and planters from MS Creation (Martijn Roes, our customer).

We will make sure he gets a full range of Agora books when they arrive this week in BKK.
Next Visit: Complete his Agora books collection.

Address: Kata Road 3 Kata Beach, Karon, Phuket 83100 Thailan / / Phuket / Phuket / Thailand
Visit Description:
Visit to Clubmed Phuket and Meet with Mr. Yves (Tropical Area)

Issue
Sample of 3 Dinning Chair and 1 Bar Chair

Bar Chair (COCO bar)
Quality is accepted. See the photo

Dinning Low Chair (COCO dining)
Quality is not accepted. We need to add side and front low bar, similar to the Bar Chair.

Rice Dining Chair (the Green chair)
The leg and seat part is ok but the back rest is break. We need to find out what exactly is the problem. Mr. Klaus will make new drawing and will discuss to Picote next week.

Spice Dining Chair (The rope weaving chair)
Hotel doesn't like the size of the rope because it is too big. The way of weaving 2 slots is ok but need the rope to be flat type, 12mm, in Cream color (Cream 31800 from Korat). Each Chair is need about 1.5 kgs of rope. We take back the chair and need to make new mockup

Bottom of the leg
We need round shape at the edge of the leg to avoid scratch and need new adjustable screw (2 inches deep inside) K. Klaus will make new drawing

All the broken Chair are returned and we will delivery to Picote next week. Once Chair arrived Permsap will bring it to Picote and discuss.
Next Visit: Permsap : follow up all issue.

K'Kurt and me have met K'Chai and K'Meaw to update BVZ Asia status, we are going to open the new office in Phuket to keep stock and improve the delivery lead time.

Curtain and Awning, Surat Baansuay and Mr.Awning are being run by the same owner.

Curtain and Awning/s main product is curtain , Surat Baansuay/s main product is furniture outdoor and indoor, Mr.Awning's main product is tensile struture.and awning.

Now aday the price is the concerned point of end users, if end users are not able to efford the Sunbrella, they will offer lagasen, VC or Nitas fabric. K'Meaw shared the info that clients do not concern on the quality, since they will change or renovate every 1 or 2 years, so the fabric which is giving 2-3 year warranty is cover and suit with client's requirment.

Thus, we informed her that right now Sunbrealla's price is more competive than before, please feel free to contact us once they got the project and new order.

They are doing the tensile structure business by using the Korean tensile fabric from Sangtong and do instalation themself.

The presented product: Nautolex, Suntex95 and Suzho fabric,

Name: ฺBoun Kena Eap
Title: Mr. EAP

Address: 8/68 Moo 3, Cherngthalay Sub-district / Thalang District / Phuket / Southern / Thailand(83110)
Visit Description:
K'Perm and me have met Mr.Dayot to introduce myself and update him about office in Phuket.

We have talked about the his showroom project; it is possible in the exiting showroom with the special corner or another place where there is a space to show the umbrella outside, He requested to have umbrella with Mineal Blue 5420 -137 with Skyline logo, he will advise soon.

Overview of this meeting is the issues that he had experienced from Suniture;
1. He needs the stock list and latest furniture.
2. Price is not maintain always changed without prior notice.
3. Lead time is not flexible enough.
4. The sample and catalogue are not updated.
5. Brochure looks more technical than commercial.
6. Price is not competitive.
Next Visit:
1. Find the Mineral Blue 5420-137 to quote the price.
2. Send the updated sample and catalouge by EMS
3. keep update the price, once there is changing.
4. Improve the lead time and manage as accordance with customer requirement.

Address: Saladaeng Colonnade / 2nd Floor, 21/10 Saladaeng Rd., Bangrak / Bangkok / Central / Thailand(10500)
Visit Description:
Visit by Team from Green Dot to the Factory.
Persons visited: Michael (MD), Peer (Techincal Director), Siriluck (GM), Sirirat (Exec. Seceratary).

They are working on a stainless steel frame sofa set with Quick Dry Foam, and Sunbrella.
The market is Germany, and initial quantity can be about 200pcs.
We have discussed all production details, and K Men has confirmed all details as well.
Mr. Peer, the Danish Technical Director, will send to us the steel frame, with velcro attached, by early December. We need to do one proto type first. Price has been approved, and payment term of 50% advance, and balance before delivery.
Fabric choice has also been finalized.
Would be interesting to know who their stainless steel frame supplier is...information not given to us, yet.
According to Open, the two Danish men are ex Sales Executives of Sun Wood Furniture.
Next Visit:
1. To Issue Official Quotation
2. Upon receipt of Deposit, to issue Job Order.

Visit Date:
9/16/2020

Sipparum Arunborrirak

Visit By Michelle TH
Visit Description:
Martijn and I visited IA 49. They are the sister company for A 49 and focuses on the interior, while A49 designs the architecture. They are a very big design firm that specialize in hotels and condominiums. They have many ongoing condominium and hotel projects but Khun Sipparum and Sukanya would not specify which ones. After digging through their website, these are their upcoming projects:

Condominium projects: One Bangkok, Ashton Asoke, and Siamese Gateway

Hospital projects: Chulalongkorn Memorial Hospital

Hotel projects: The JW Marriot Resort in Phuket, and Palm 360 in Dubai

Other projects: PTT headquarter office, and a Broadcasting studio for NBT

They were already familiar with Forms & Surfaces. We explained to them that we are currently the exclusive distributor and that F&S now has a production facility in India, allowing us to give better prices and lead times.

We left all our brochures with Khun Sipparum and she will contact us if they have any inquiries.
Next Visit:
Perm will keep an eye on overseas projects

Su will keep an eye on condominium projects in Bangkok

Pookie will keep an eye on Marriot Resort in Phuket

Hotel projects: The JW Marriot Resort in Phuket, and Palm 360 in Dubai

Other projects: PTT headquarter office, and a Broadcasting studio for NBT

They were already familiar with Forms & Surfaces. We explained to them that we are currently the exclusive distributor and that F&S now has a production facility in India, allowing us to give better prices and lead times.

We left all our brochures with Khun Sipparum and she will contact us if they have any inquiries.

Visit Description:
This company was originally Austhai Marine, but it was sold by the former owner, Ray.

I was contacted by Ron for fabrics to be used on their new catamarans.
The design is done by Albatross.
The specified fabrics were mostly European Sunbrella and some vinyl.

i explained him about Agora, Sauleda, Eqomare, Eqodry and left samples.
I advised him to use Plains and Panama for the cushions, while also opportunities for Eqomare for upholstery and the headboards of the beds.

He prefers to work with fabrics we have in stock.

They have order of 14 boats, all same design, so volumes could be substantial.

Prices were sent today.

They have plenty of orders too of smaller commercial boats for Palau, Philippines and Maldives. Usually cheaper materials are used for those.

Visit By Jum BVZTH
Visit Description:
Met Khun Benjaporn with her sister and K.Eve , assistant.
They are looking for fabrics to make tent hotels 55 tents, looking to open next year but all fabrics will be bought within this year.

They do not want Herculite as it looks rigid and unnatural which contrasts of the design that they and the designer want to achieve. (please see attached pictures)

They have calculate 6000 yards of fabrics to be used.
The outer layer will be Sunbrella supreme and the second layer could be normal awning.

Inside the tent , there will be electrical appliances. I addressed my concern if they do not use a proper waterproof rooftop could be a problem.

I presented projects references which they are greatly impressed.

Also, there will be director chairs / sofa /cushons to be used in the project.

They will organise a meeting for me to meet with the designer to finalise colours. I told them that I will bring a director chair and sunbun along for them to see and test.

10/14/2016

Nigel HOW

Visit By Kurt De Wilde
Visit Description:
Visited Krysallis Marine with Tan.

Nigel is English, with a career in the navy and then stayed more than 10 years in Hong Kong before finally settling down in Singapore. His company repairs high(er)-end boats. Knows Grant in Pattaya and Muzza in Phuket. It is a small world.

We introduced a variety of products
- QSnap/CAF: very interested in these
- UltraClear / Strataglass / CrystalClear: explained the differences
- Seaguard Flex
- Tangent
- Nautolex
- Phifertex/Suntex
- Sunworker
- Tenara: very interested
- Quick Dry Foam

Left him 1 USB stick with info on all our products and a few samples.

He mentioned there is a marine/ luxury show this weekend in Singapore (SINGAPORE RENDEZVOUS), similar to the shows we participated before in Hainan (China) as Suniture. I asked Tan to go and visit but he was unsure if he would be able to make it because of his projects deadlines.

Customer Name: Kamala beach resort & hotel management Co., Ltd.
Address: Unit 2909 B, Level 29, 999/9 The offices at central world / Rama 1 Rd., Patumwan, BKK / Bangkok / Thailand / Thailand(10330)
Visit Date:
10/12/2016

Roland Bleszynski, Ph.D.

Visit By Jum BVZTH
Visit Description:
With Aey and Claudia, met with Roland , MD of Mont Azure project.
1 hotel, 4 beach clubs, and a retirement home.
Main designer is Tierra.

Roland had managed many high end projects in the past 10 years. He is very knowledgable about top furniture brands in the world.

He recognises high quality products but he does not like our products due to designs are not interesting. Also he looks for something that noone in Phukets has. He thinks Kenkoon furniture are boring and will not use them in projects.

The fitting stainless grade must be 316 only. With the quantity of all projects he expects to meet MOQ. with 5 year warranty challenge to us.
I have mentioned that our products though they are not modern but offering comfort and functionality, and we could work with his designers to custom furniture required.

He told us to contact interior designers (tthere are about 4 companies working) because he would like each of them different. Most of them we have never heard before.

Four eye and Habitat are 2 of them. I will see them next week. With Habitat, we could offer ATEX and Sunworker.
Next Visit:
Send Roland Funiture by Rauch
and Siam collection and these are quite different.

Visit Description:

For umbrella already send to quotation to customer as well (Aus 25).

Name: Robert Conte
Title: Robert Conte

Address: 221/2 Moo 20, KWAEWAI ROAD / T.ROBWIENG, A. MUANG / CHIANG RAI / Northern / Thailand(57000)
Visit Date:
2/19/2012

JUSTIN MALCOLM

Visit By Jum BVZTH
Visit Description:
Met Justin the GM with the help of Yoni 4seasons tented camp Chiang Rai. The hotel has opened for 4-5 years.

The FB manager Renaud moved from Sheraton Sukhumvit and would like furniture covers for all sunbeds and furnitures and cushions near restaurant area.

He has no plan to change anything this year.

All sunbed cushions are worn out and torn. Fabrics used are Sunbrella.
awing fabirc. They expect the fabrics to last more than 5 years without tearing. I had explained how they should expect it to last. They insist to use awning fabric for sunbed because the tough nature of it.

I suggest them to change for Furniture fabric + QDF and offers to make a mock up piece so that they could test it out and plan to replace in 2013.
Fabric used is Charcoal New Finish. 2931.

No budget for this year except for those furniture covers as it rains a lot and they need to welcome guests after the rain stops so they need something more efficient to protect cushions from the wet.

They are keen on Phifers placemats and rugs.

Name: Sirot Hemdilokwanich

Address: 39th/f Ocean Tower II 75/108-109 Sukhumvit 19, / Klongtoey Nua Vadhana / Bangkok / central / Thailand(10110)
Visit Description:
Perm and I visited Leo Design Group and did a presentation on forms & surfaces. The designers had other appointments lined up and only gave us 30 minutes to present. We focused on F&S for 20 minutes and quickly introduced Suniture products and Eqoshade during the last 10 minutes.

They were very interested in the bonded metal and bonded quartz so we left them a set of samples to keep in their library.

They were impressed in the variety of products we have and would like us to come back to their office another time to present to the whole team. They usually dedicate 1 day a week, inviting different companies to present their products. However, they already have many companies lined up and the next available time slot would be next year.

Khun Nuas mentioned that they have a few ongoing local and overseas projects but would not specify where. According to their website, their portfolio includes - hotels, residential, commercial and hospitals. Their projects span across the Asia Pacific, the Middle East, Eastern Europe, Central Europe and North Africa. Their company has been working closely with most renowned international hotel management companies such as Kempinski, Shangri La, Le Meridien, Accor, Marriott, Hilton, Moevenpick, Inter-Continental and Dusit Thani.
Next Visit: Perm will follow up and book a time slot for another company presentation.

I promise him to send a cleaning video and 303 fabric cleaner.

Remarks:

The training has been given since opening but it seems no one followed and many staff who were trained have left.
Next Visit: Send Manuel cleaning video and 303 fabric cleaner.

Address: 5th Fl.,Maboonkrong Bldg., Room No.5C01-5C02, / 444 Payathai Rd.,Wangmai,Pathumwan / Bangkok / Central / Thailand(10330)
Visit Description: A purchasing officer named Khun Pum got in touch with me. In mid-August, she had inquired about Gore Tenara thread and had recently made the decision to purchase our materials in order to make high-wind awnings. She mentioned that she had a clean thread sample from a long time ago, but she wanted to give it a try first. I thus used the occasion to drop off the thread and take her office a visitï¿½it primarily sells roller blinds. I thus brought Suntex and Monotec for her to deliberate considering. She appeared to be more interested in Suntex than Monotec, and if the thread she purchased worked well, she might make another purchase from us.

Franck Delen

Visit By Jum BVZTH
Visit Description:
Met Franck , Sophie, and Leo management team of this refurbished small hotel in Sukhumvit 33.They bought white Clipper set from Food & hotel show and souk singles and Kashbah loveseat in White. They mostly organise parties in the evening which is quite challenging to stick to white at all time.

I was there to give a cleaning session. Most items are already dirty but not in so bad condition. Soap water with toothbrush can handle it, only problem is there are just 3 maids with no washing maching at the hotel. They outsource laundry service. Our products require more attention than other plastic items.

They want to coat the fabrics in order to protect the fabric from dirt and water.

Left sample bottle of fabric guard and cleaner.
Next Visit: Sent them cleaning instruction.

Address: 74 Soi Langsuan Ploenchit Road / / Bangkok / Central / Thailand(10330)
Visit Description:
I exchanged fabric samples with K. Book, the Hilton Hua Hin project's interior designer. Our fabric specifications were Tu-3951 texture ugo, which is not available, and Tu-3739 Panama Blanco, which is available in Thailand.

Tu-3951 was out of stock and would not be produced for another six to eight weeks, according to the Spain team's check. I brought the fabric in stock to offer in case the designer changed their mind. Our in stock fabric, Artisan TU-1409 and Tu-1410, differed from the specification in terms of texture and color. As a result, the designer switched to Sunbrella cloth. How unfortunate!

Visit Description:
Date 29 April 2014
Company : PHS Cambodia
Mr. Sothy Neang
General manager
Email : sothy@phscambodia.com
Tel 855 11 888 270

PHS has been moved to the new office. Photo is a beautiful house office.

PHS has been purchased from Suniture for long times. K Sothy is being a regular supply for chemical, i.e. shampoo, oil and soap for many hotel in Siem Reap. He also purchase from us fabrics and cushion. However, due to having much competitor from cheaper fabrics and cushion from China, Vietnam and Thailand, Sunbrella and QDF can't be sold that much in Siem Reap now.

K Sothy asked new quote for an umbrella cover. He will confirm order next week if price is acceptable.

Visit By Permsap
Visit Description:
PHS Cambodia is a hospitality supply. Mr. Sothy know K Kit for long times. Now he is supplying chemical, kitchen ware for the hotel. He use to purchase our fabrics and umbrella for Phunbaitong hotel long times agao.

Name: Philippe M. Guenat
Title: Mr. Philippe Guenat

Customer Name: PMG Shipyard (formerly Bakri Cono Co., Ltd.)
Address: 5/7 Moo4, T. Noenpra / A. Muangrayong / Rayong / Eastern / Thailand(21150)
Visit Date:
1/29/2021

Mrs.Caroline

Visit By Kurt De Wilde
Visit Description:
They seem to work closely with Grant (Rocket/North Sail) who has his factory not that far from there, but that they had some bad experiences with him the first time he made cushions for them.
Because of the proximity, it would be easier to work with Grant for the cushion making (measuring, fitting, etc), but we could also help out.

I further educated them about our foam and the differences with other foams. Caroline said that especially American customers want foam they are familiar with so I said that our foam is produced by a American-Thai com[any with the American partner being the same that introduced the FastDry in the American market. She said that also could be a selling point.

The first boat that could be using our foam is in about 3-4 months. I asked them to contact Tangmo when they are about to use the foam.

Because of the proximity, it would be easier to work with Grant for the cushion making (measuring, fitting, etc), but we could also help out.

I further educated them about our foam and the differences with other foams. Caroline said that especially American customers want foam they are familiar with so I said that our foam is produced by a American-Thai com[any with the American partner being the same that introduced the FastDry in the American market. She said that also could be a selling point.

The first boat that could be using our foam is in about 3-4 months. I asked them to contact Tangmo when they are about to use the foam.

They bought 5422 # Antique Beige for 320 yards from us in June for making Sun Lounger Cover for the outdoor area. Then, they cut them out for 8 yards for making the 2 samples for trail first. Visit Date:
8/26/2016

Krista Dijkhuis

Visit By Kurt De Wilde
Visit Description:
After finding her on LinkedIn, I made appointment with Krista. Tangmo and myself met with her.
She was quite familiar with Sunbrella and had worked with Suniture before, but she could not remember who her contact was.
She asked for new sample books, because she only had some old swatches.
She is involved in some hotel projects and also some residential and restaurant projects. Sometimes she just specifies and in other cases, she is also involved in the actual purchasing and making of the cushions/pillows.
Now she was looking for fabrics for "The Bubble Restaurant and Lounge" where we met, together with Peter Ton, a real estate developer who also was involved in the restaurant.
Peter also has worked with Suniture, knows Henk but was not too happy about Suniture and an inquiry for sofas which took much too long to be replied and finally died.
We showed
- In&Out: we left 1 book
- US Fur
- Shift
- Icon (we left her 1 Icon swatchcard)
- Galaxy prototype (we promised her a book when it would be available)
- Bitex: we left 1 book
- Sunbrella XL: we left 1 book
- Eqoshade umbrellas, especially the P6 (Buru)
- Sunworker (more of interest for Peter)
- Suntex

We also gave her 1 USB stick of both BVZ and Sunture.

they were extremely happy with our presentation.
Next Visit: - Send Galaxy Book

The owner's K.Lily and Interior designer 's K.Pae'.
The new Shanghai Inn Inn-in the heart of vibrant Yaowaraj road recaptures charm and ofbygone era.
The Shanghai Inn is a lifestyle hotel uniquely distinguished by its intimacy, hospitality and exquisite style chinoise.

She have shown me around suite room and superior room. Each room was decorated by lampshades similar style as our Lotus lampshade design. They bought it from Vietnam. Most of cushion covers are chinese silk and lampshade cover made of cotton fabric so it is not gonna last very long. They might need to change all cover.

Address: 1573 Petchkasem rd., Cha-Am, Cha-Am, Petchburi / / / / Thailand(76120)
Visit Date:
12/20/2012

Martin Raich

Visit By Jum BVZTH
Visit Description:
Met Martin and Andreas at the resort with Henk.

Henk showed them Thallon chaise (order of Peter de Jong at Baan Ing Phu) ,the Gm likes it but all depends on price.

Buru;

-Base consumes a lot of space : if there is something cover on top and work as table. it would be useful.
-the owner will take a look and let us know the feedback.


Kashbah single;

-the arm coming lose and does not hold the back. Martin wants to exchange to Souk seat. Henk said ok.
-there will be 12 pcs in total coming back if we let them exchange. I suggest to find way to fix the arm or stitch it permanently rather than exchanging all of them. The customers doesnt want to open it as a sunbed.

*i recommend to sell this product as a sunbed, not for seat*


Sunbed cushion;

No string stiched on the side. Need string to be stitched on the side. Ping will take the string back and use local to stitch it.

The GM strongly needs to replace all wooden sunbed with aluminium sunbed with textilene to save labour, maintaining, cushion cost. He is open to our proposal of this type of sunbed.

Visit Description:
Further to Kwang's visit to Siam at Siam in pattaya which is a new hotel opening in end Nov. K. Ben, the GM liked to order 10 sunbuns and suggested we see K. Pang, a project coordinator to present it at the head office in BKK.


I met K. Pang and she has given me a floor plan of floor 24th and 25th.

She said they have not decided which supplier to go for regarding 64 synthetic rattan sunbeds for both floors.

I presented her mini sunbed cushion to go with those sunbeds . It was well recieved because I showed her moldy cushions pictures taken from other hotels and emphasized problem they will have if they use pvc sunbeds or normal foam.

She will discuss with her boss regarding spec so that we could quote.
Regarding the umbrella, she does not want fabrics due to strong wind on 24th floor so I presented her znet which will be used for umbrella covers and she sees the benefits.

She mentioned that the hotel has low budget , the same as Siam @ Siam and Mode in Bangkok. She expects our price to be very low because they tend to use cheaper fabrics.

We will do our best to be part of this new project.

Address: 19/99-101 M5 Soi 5/9 Klong 3 / Klongluang / Pathumthani / Pathumthani / Thailand(12120)
Visit Date:
7/28/2015

Edmund Chia

Visit By Kurt De Wilde
Visit Description:
Johan told us they have BIG problems with the umbrella covers. They use an eyelet on a fabric strip that always rips after some time. I told them that we have made thousands of umbrellas and have rich experience in that field. Johan said they are very interested to visit us and discuss this issue and see how we can cooperate in that filed. Edmund said that they started as a metal (stainless steel) manufacturer but that they are now asked to do many things that are not really their strength. They also struggle with the consistency in size of their umbrella covers.

Maybe the QSnap may be a solution for their problem, if they want something special, but KFT should some tests first to see if this works.

We also saw furniture covers made from a Chinese PVC material which only costs only 90THB/meter. I was surprised that Royal Botania would go for something this cheap.

I will try to get in touch with Michiel and the boss in Belgium and invite them to visit us (BVZ and KF) to talk about a closer cooperation, including distribution of their furniture into the Thai hospitality market.
Name: Edmund Chia

Address: 12th Floor Exchange Tower, / 388 Sukhumvit rd., Klongtoey / Bangkok / / Thailand(10110)
Visit Date:
6/22/2011

Sumitra Pinitnorachai

Visit By Jum BVZTH
Visit Description: With Ben, we met K. Nutch who in charge in sourcing products and K. Aod who in charge of maintainance of Starbucks all over the country. We presented our umbrellas , cushions, sofa. They are quite direct with what they want as every single items bought for the shop will be instructed by the headquater in the US. Therefore, they are not able to chose our products. What they need us to do and I think it could be a chance to start with them by replacing covers for them. They are not interested in our frames as they will change to aluminium and always buy in bulk from the headquater. The only focus they want from a supplier is meeting the deadline (7 days) and services. They would like to try out our service and workmanship in a small number of umbrella cover and possibly fixed awning. For the upholstery work, Ben will contact a subcontractors they normally use.
Next Visit: Follow up and quote price to them for umbrella cover only and whole umbrella with alumimium frame which, as a circumstance might change in the future.

Address: Behind Muang Mai Market, 1/1 Muang Samut Road / Changmoi Subdistrict, Muang District / Chiang Mai / North / Thailand(50300)
Visit Description:
TCDC is the organisation where they used to designed the interior for Four Season Chiang Mai Resort (at Mae-Rim) As we talked to K.Tai, she said that this organization is about to cooperate with both business owner and interior designer. They will arrange the owner of business to present their items among the interior designer team in order to convince them to using their products. This gives an opportunity to both of their clients to purchase and to sell their products.

The headquarter of TCDC is in New York where everyone can distribute their products over their country. The branch in Thailand (Bangkok) is also the first branch in Asia.

They held the event every year in Chiang Mai and Bangkok. The event helps the owner of company to promote their products through the booth, the event attract lot of visitors who are interesting with the finished-products such as furniture, fabrics, clothes and jewelries. She also mentioned that this year the event will be held on mid-February, plus a large textile company such as Jim Thompson will also be held in this event.

It is worth to mention that TCDC is the government organization where we can held our booth without any charges (depend on this year regulation).

Address: 114 Moo5 / Hangdong / Chiangmai / Thailand / Thailand(50230)
Visit Description:
Retail customer with Khun. Ty
Went to guide installation for Khun. Ty

They purchased a 2M x 1.5M awning from us using Sunbrella fabric. Their team has no idea of installation, so I oversaw the installation for 3 hours as a first step.

K. Ty over promised the customer as they wanted a cassette to cover the fabric and the â€˜flashing/hoodâ€™ was unsatisfactory (produced by K.TY). Due to the height of the awning, I initially recommended using a motor, but they went for manual operation instead as K. Ty pushed them to use a manual one (even though price is not a constraint, this customer runs a trading business selling electronics in Chiangmai).

K. Tyâ€™s inability to explain to the customer properly led to confusion and disappointment between him and the customer but aimed to put blame on us claiming that we are unprofessional when he was the one dealing with the customer as they over expected and did not communicate clearly with K. Ty.

However, from our behalf we fulfilled what we promised and fixed the problems that we created e.g. swapping for a longer crank rod, length of projection/arms. I understand that it is the early stages with retail but I would devote Lookmeeâ€™s time in selling screens and pergolas to hotels instead as they are straightforward and have more potential. -Send

Address: 4/811 Soi Sakae Ngam 5, Rama 2 Rd., / Samaedam, Bangkhunthian Bangkok 10150 / / / Thailand
Visit Description:
Khun Anansit is the owner of Thai Thamdee, he has been running this business for 30 years. Thai Thamdee is selling the Awning Fabric, and installing the Awning, and Tents. He is kind of the shop around people, does not have the Brand Loyalty; however, the price is not the main concerned point for him, but after sale service, ready stock and delivery. He is doing the business with Regacen, but not satisfy with the service. He loves to have many suppliers in his hand, because if one of them does not have stock, he will order from others. He is very interested in Awning Fabric for making the wing of Air craft, so the spec sheet of Awning will be sent to him. Apart from that he used to import the Tension membrane from China, but the origin of product comes from Germany brand Heytex, also he likes the Suntex95 and Nautolex. Visit Description:
I have met K'Chaiya who is the MD of Thaweewat, I started from introducing myself, and then talk about his business, he is friend of Songkit and Sang Thong, kind of close friend, I mentioned that Songkit just placed the order 120 maters of Ultra clear. he is interested in.

He has been importing Orchestar from Dickson directly with the price is cheaper than Sunbrella(he claimed that), Thus, I put him the info our target is mid - low clients, we have the competitive price which is mid class can effort.

The presented products: Suntex95, Sunworker(which he ordered from Dickson), Ultraclrear, Tenara, Awning and Marine Collection and Z-net Extrablock.

He is interested in all the product presented, except Tenara as he could not effort the price, because he is using cost (500 baht/cone) from Sang Thong.

I gave him all the printed price list right away, so that I could feel his feeling about price and quality. I emphasized that all the product which I presented have warranty, you should not be worry about quality, once there is any problem, I will be there.

Additional, price is not the big deal between us, price can be negotiated, once he got the order.
Next Visit:
1. Follow up order and keep update info.
2. Build the tight relation, since he is friend of Sang Thong and Songkit.

Visit By Kurt De Wilde
Visit Description:
K. Perm, K. Seng and myself walked in the shop.
Bibi explained (in very good English) that they mostly work for residential customers, but also few projects.

We have to see if we will service all shops on that stretch of street in Phuket (Mr. Curtain, FabricCity, The Curtain Shop, Aqua Hotel Supply) or just choose one or spread our products over various shops there.
For now, FabricCity is our preferred partner there, very loyal since the early days.

Visit Description:
Yspshaus Studio exactly is Interior and Landscape Designer, but in the same time K'Putto who is the owner do the turn key people for Private Villa, Hotel and office, now he is interested in the material which is can be made to be the roof, canopy and awning. Thus the presented products to him are Z-Net, Sunbrella Awning, Sunworker, Duraskin Suntex95 and Atex, I explained him about their application and how perfect with what he is looking for.

He used to work with reputation interior company, committee for Architect institute, and consultant for Landscape and interior, he shared me for the trend of house design; right now people love to spend time outside to have party, BBQ or read book, etc, so they are looking for the material that can protect the UV Ray as comfortable as if they are inside house. He always find the inspiration from Korea and Japan to design house, as those countries always have the new design; and European always have the new innovation and new material.

However, he had no Idea what is the Sunbrella and 100% Solution dry acrylic, so it is time to educate prospect, also he told me that in past there was the Sunbrella advertising in the decoration magazine, but he does not see it anymore, anyway, I will send him the Furniture collection.
Next Visit:
1. Follow up if there is any new project.
2. send him the Furniture collection as he is interested in.
3. send him the VDO of Sunworker, Z-net and Duraskin.
